generalInfo:
This tailor made tour is 16 nights, spend 12 nights exploring Kerala with a 4 night extension to the beautiful Maldives.

Your Kerala adventure will start with three nights in a fantastic retreat in the Western Ghat foothills. Here you can just relax by the river in a hammock or explore the farm, spices and rubber plantations. Even head into the kitchen and see the talented chef in action.

Head further up the mountain to the Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary and stay in an eco-resort. Take part in a soft trek into the reserve, attend a martial arts display and even roll up your sleeves and get involved in a cookery lesson.

Next stop is the backwaters. We have included two contrasting areas.
The first is two nights on a Houseboat experiencing the waterways while relaxing on deck watching the communities pass by. Then transfer to a remote island retreat and get away from the crowds, take a wander on "crow island" and have dinner on a narrow boat.

Fort Cochin is a great harbour city to explore - on your city tour visit the main sites and we can always include a school visit. Also see the fascinating art form of Kathakali!

Finish with four nights on a lovely Maldives island called Makunudu - its tagline says it all "More Attenborough than Love Island".

This tour includes a real mixture of accommodation - a homestay, eco resort, remote retreat, heritage hotel and an island paradise.

dayInfo.description: Depart the UK. Flights can be booked by us and therefore the whole holiday will be protected under our ATOL.
Arrive Cochin Airport and transfer to Kodikulam (2 hrs). Three nights at Dewalokam Retreat.
Two full days to enjoy the experiences at Dewalokam.
Transfer up the Western Ghats to Periyar (4 hrs). Three nights at Spice Village.
Morning soft trek into the Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary. Evening Kalaripayattu performance.
Day to explore the area with your driver. Evening cookery lesson and dinner at BBQ.
Transfer to the Backwaters (4 hrs) and board your Houseboat for two nights.
Disembark the Houseboat and transfer by car (1 hr) to a quiet/remote Backwater retreat accessible by boat. Two nights at Kayal Island Retreat. Dinner experience on a narrow boat.
Transfer to Fort Cochin (1 hr). Check in to Secret Garden for 2 nights. Evening Kathakali Performance.
Transfer to Cochin Airport (1.5 hrs) for your flight with Indigo to Male (10:00/11:10). On arrival transfer by boat to Makunudu Island for four nights.
Transfer by boat to Male Airport for your flight home.
